step1_clusters.draft_title: EcoBloom Summer Campaign Kickoff & Initial Planning
EcoBloom Summer Campaign Design Revisions & Legal Review

split_operations.reason: This cluster contains a mix of project phases (design revisions and legal review) for the EcoBloom Summer Campaign. Splitting it would allow for better organization and focused discussions on each phase.

ai_operations.reasoning: Cluster 001 is focused on the kickoff and initial planning for the EcoBloom campaign. Cluster 002 is primarily focused on the timeline and deliverables for the EcoBloom campaign. Cluster 003 is dedicated to the FitFusion rebranding project planning. Cluster 004 is dedicated to the TechNova social media strategy development. Cluster 005, while related to EcoBloom, covers both design revisions and legal review, which are distinct phases of the project. Splitting it improves clarity and allows for focused discussions. Clusters 001-004 are distinct projects and/or phases within projects and should be kept separate.
